title: Add user-defined outcome configuration + validation for fit model calibration

sections.text: Implement a backend configuration layer that lets users select the calibration outcome (activation, retention, or expansion) and define the corresponding label rules (event/field mapping and time window). Add validation that required data sources/signals are available and that labels can be generated for the selected outcome. Expose clear errors when an outcome cannot be computed due to missing fields/events so calibration does not silently fall back to defaults.
